thread.title: Can’t think of time when Muslims ‘assimilated into the broader culture of civilization’
thread.title_full: Can’t think of time when Muslims ‘assimilated into the broader culture of civilization’ - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Can’t think of time when Muslims ‘assimilated into the broader culture of civilization’
text: SIOUX CITY, Iowa -- Rep. Steve King (R-Iowa), speaking about Syrian and Iraqi refugees, said he can't think of a time when Muslims have assimilated into another culture. "I’m all about assimilation and whatever people can come here and assimilate and they’re here legally, I’m for those folks," King said. Iraqi Christians, including some King […] ...
